title: LP bug in ranked flex?
body:
I have been consistently getting 27LP for each win.  Today I got 13LP?  

27W 18L 
Win Ratio 60%

I think there is a bug with the LP being given.  Last night's win gave me 27 ... the very next win (today) gives me 13.  

Could you please look into ranked LP gains as of 11.1.2018 ?

replies.body: Same for me, got 12 Lp (usually ~ 23 LP).
Just happened to me in Ranked Queue as well. Normally get around 20+, got 10 for this game
